titleStmt.title: The urinal of physick By Robert Record Doctor of physick. Whereunto is added an ingenious treatise concerning physicians, apothecaries, and chyrurgians, set forth by a Dr. in Queen Elizabeths dayes. With a translation of Papius Ahalsossa concerning apothecaries confecting their medicines; worthy perusing and following.
titleStmt.author: Record, Robert, 1510?-1558.
Pape, Joseph, 1558-1622. Tractatus de medicamentorum praeparationibus. English. aut

notesStmt.note: "A detection of some faults in unskilful physitians" has separate dated title page; register and pagination are more or less continuous.
"A translation of Papius concerning apothecaries" is a translation of Pape's Tractatus de medicamentorum praeparationibus; published in Wittenberg in 1612.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
